import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./UserRegistration.css" function UserRegistration() { const [department , setDepartment] = useState(); const getAllDepartment=()=>{ getAllDepartment().then((resp)=>{ setDepartment(resp.data); console.log(resp.data); }).catch((error)=>{ console.log(error); }) } useEffect(()=>{ getAllDepartment(); } , []) return (

User-Registration

) } export default UserRegistration
